item.title: FAQs
item.description: See read and learn from our FAQ's

item.title: Javadoc
item.description: The Nutch 1.X releases are cut from the Nutch master branch code base. Nutch 2.X is a different code base and uses different data structures. For more information on the 2.X branch, we urge users to consult the Nutch 2 wiki documentation. Note that Nutch 2.X has been retired in October 2019 and Nutch 2.4 is the last release of the Nutch 2.x line. Nightly (Development) Javadoc 1.X SNAPSHOT Nightly (Development) Nutch Configuration Properties Nutch 1.
